card.name: Taven Troubles
card.scene: Far Far Away has many beautiful sights, this ain't one of em.

card.name: The Giant Claw
card.scene: A giant claw appears out of the sky and attacks things. BOOOM-BANG-AAAAH!

card.name: Mazes and Monsters
card.scene: Disheartened by his late mothers farm yield and his poor choice of investment partners, Shrekolas Cage sets off into the Elf Nation to steal the declaration of independence.

part.name: Talking Dog
part.line: But what if it doesn't exist?

part.name: Shrekolas Cage
part.line: After 180 years of searching, I'm only three feet away.

card.name: SHREKNADO
card.scene: Off the coast of Far Far Away, the ship of shark fin smuggler Humpty Dumpty is caught in a cyclone, interrupting his meeting with a potential buyer. A tornado throws swarms of sharks onto the boat, eating all aboard. Eventually making it's way to Far Far Away, who will stop it?

card.name: American Elf
card.scene: Rupert's companion Marty disappears in a freak tornado. Rupert enlists the aid of the Sidekick Friends network.

part.name: Drunk Farmer
part.line: Git outta me barn, I ain't seen no Morty!

card.name: DONKEY KONG LIVES
card.scene: After his apparent death, Donkey Kong is saved by modern magic and meets mankind's newest discovery, a washing machine.

card.name: The Slob.
card.scene: An ogre sits at home all day doing just about nothing. We don't know why we filmed it but here it is I guess. - Guillermo del Toro

card.name: Leprechaun 9
card.scene: An ansty elf pretends to be the Leprechaun until the real one shows up. A Netflix adaptation.

part.name: Leprechaun
part.line: ME POT OF GOLD IS SOILED!

card.name: The GingerDEAD Man
card.scene: Evil never tasted so good!

part.name: Woman with Knife
part.line: Keep that thing away from me!

part.name: Man in Milk
part.line: It burns! But it tastes great!

card.name: Cave Dwellers
card.scene: A documentary on the lifestyle of the local Cyclops community. Banned in 10 kingdoms for its controversial footage.

card.name: The Robbers of Beans
card.scene: Puss in Boots confronts the toughest thug in his gang, Fuzzy Wuzzy, in an abbreviated cat fight. Puss settles the dispute with fearless guile and a kick in the family jewels. Fuzzy Wuzzy wasn't so fuzzy was he?

card.name: Beyond the Tail: Life without Balence
card.scene: Puss discovers for the first time that his ability to do cartwheels has disappeared along with his tail. Other cowboys attempt to console him.

card.name: An Ogre Called 'Cow'
card.scene: Nothing will settle the debates among the skeptical locals, short of a demonstration of Roy's special talents.

part.name: Amused Witness
part.line: Am I in the splash zone?

card.name: Far Far Away Idol Commercial
card.scene: Simon Cowell encourages all to watch the Far Far Away Idol show, because apparently T.V. still matters in a fantasy world.

part.name: Simon Cowell
part.line: If you've got a big mouth and you're controversial, you're going to get attention!

card.name: Potions Commercial
card.scene: The Fairy Godmother demonstrates the effects of her latest potion; stress-b-gone. Unfortunately the test subject disappeared in thin air.

card.name: Fiona: Princess of Action
card.scene: Fiona embarks on a journy to reclaim one of her families secret fried chicken recipies. Shrek's nerves get the better of him when the bucket of chicken speaks about Bernie Sanders.

part.name: Kicked in Face
part.line: Arrrggh! *Spielberg wants you to actually get kicked in the face for this role*

card.name: Hell Comes to Elftown
card.scene: After the trapeze indident, the traveling circus takes time out to get drunk and start a brawl.

card.name: Shrekespear in Lubbock
card.scene: Shrek decides that it is time to be movin' on. Fiona convinces him to stick around just long enough to get into big trouble.

card.name: Shrinking Ogre!
card.scene: Shrek and Donkey mix the wrong potion and end up 100 times smaller. Stuck inside of the castle, they have to find a way to grow back.

part.name: Sketchy Rat
part.line: I'll show you's the cheese, hehehe.

card.name: Troll 4: Three was not enough
card.scene: An enchanted onion husk discovers his long-lost sister Marcie, and instructs her in the ways of surviving the troll invasion.

card.name: Witch Cop?
card.scene: A song and dance extravaganza, "A Broomstick Banger." - Simon Cowell

card.name: Humor at the Expense of Onions
card.scene: Humpty and his cohort of unfeeling smart-mouths make fun of Shrek and his great cart of onions.

card.name: The Search for Donkey
card.scene: Alone in the wilderness, Donkey makes the best of his situation. In what seems like no time at all, he constructs a sturdy two-story house from branches and mud... with his own hooves.

part.name: Hobo with Bulldozer
part.line: Nice house! Shame if somebody bulldozed it.

card.name: Enchanted Onion Sauce Commercial
card.scene: A dozen grizzled elves surround a fire. Suddenly, they exclaim, "That's not garlic!"

card.name: The Donkey Hunter
card.scene: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the kingdom of Far Far Aways War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small magical town in the swamp.

card.name: One False Step for Ogrekind
card.scene: After a dozen failed attempts, one rocket carries Shrek and his three children to the Moon, where they enjoy a picnic and a spirited game of badminton.

part.name: Hal
part.line: I'm sorry Shrek, I'm afraid I can't do that."

card.name: The Magnificent Sven
card.scene: Sven is a gifted swordfighter, eager to take on the kingdoms finest warriors. Then he discovers one fatal flaw; he's blind.

card.name: How They Get Onions
card.scene: Josie asks Shrek how they get onions. After a thoughtful pause, he begins. "Not like you'd expect!"

part.name: Onion Farmer
part.line: This one ain't even that big!

card.name: 12 Angry Ogres
card.scene: Following the closing arguments in a murder trial, the 12 members of the jury must deliberate, with a guilty verdict meaning death for the accused, an inner-city elf.

card.name: Ghostbusters
card.scene: In an absurd dream sequence, Crockett recalls an episode of fear and chaos in which his childhood friend Timmy was trapped at the bottom of a well.

part.name: Dr.Venkman
part.line: I ain't afraid of no ghosts!

card.name: Shrekback Mountain
card.scene: The story of a forbidden and secretive relationship between two Ogres, and their lives over the years.

card.name: Young Frankenshrek
card.scene: An enchanted grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that his grandfather was not as insane as people believe, is invited to Far Far Away, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

part.name: Sober Physician
part.line: This is the part where you run away screaming!

card.name: Gladiator
card.scene: Hector makes a surprising discovery behind the Chinese grocery store.

card.name: Taxi Driver
card.scene: A mentally unstable ex-knight works as a nighttime taxi driver in Far Far Away, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a castle worker and an onion farmer.

part.name: Wizard
part.line: Skidaddle skidoodle, you're onion is now a poodle!

card.name: Fight Club
card.scene: An insomniac factory worker and a devil-may-care potion maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

part.name: File Clerk
part.line: I love my job I swear!

part.name: Tyler Durden
part.line: The things you own end up owning you.

card.name: Onion Runner
card.scene: An onion runner must pursue and terminate four enchanted onions who stole a carriage in the fields, and have returned to Far Far Away to find their creator.

card.name: The Godmother
card.scene: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of her clandestine empire to her reluctant son.

card.name: How They Get Onions
card.scene: Josie is thoroughly off onions at this point. Shrek shows her one more way that she might not have heard of before.

part.name: A Horse
part.line: No Sir, I don't like it!

card.name: Shrek-E
card.scene: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting cyborg-ogre inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of ogrekind.

card.name: Shrek's Final Frontier
card.scene: Shrek and the gang embark on a mystical journey to find the author of Shrek; William Steig.
